description: Application for non-material amendments to planning permission ref: PA/18/03624, dated 11/04/2019. Non-Material amendment(s) Sought:Front Entrance (West Elevation)Front entrance staircase has been reduced in size to allow an additional stair access to lower ground floor in compliance with fire regulations and safety.Front entrance zinc cladding has been replaced with brickwork.Lift entry area has been amended to suit brickwork design. Door has been added to enclose for a safer and secure zone.Minor layout/arrangement changes have been made to lower ground front terraces. Planters have been removed to maximise usable space. Minor layout/arrangement changes have been made to lower ground utility room.Mailbox and meters area added. Bin store amended to enclose with metal gates. Additional low wall bin store area added to comply with Tower Hamlets suggested waste and refuse usage. Minor layout/arrangement changes have been made to guest cycle parking. Rear Entrance (East Elevation) Minor layout/arrangement and level changes have been made to rear terraces and shared gardens. Use of rear entrance zinc cladding has been reduced to the top of the portal only, and the rest replaced with brickwork.Minor layout/arrangement changes have been made to door and portal to suit design.
